Articles.Content:
Hi gang. Just started playing and I am amazed on how much fun I'm having. That being said, is there a thread with possible things to come for the game? I was curious if there would be more "life" like things added to the game, like having an astronaut training center where we could actually train and watch them train. And things such as driving out to the launch pad prior to launch, riding the elevator, kinda like the Apollo missions, things like that. Thanks and looking forward to seeing you guys in multiplayer some day.

Jack

Edited January 21, 2015 by Deputydog857

Hi Jack,

Welcome to the forum. Nothing quite that immersive has been planned. They're overhauling the games aerodynamics and have said they may add another tier to the buidlings as well as possibly adding deep space refueling at some point. Although the latter 2 might not happen at all. We'll see.

You can check out the Daily Kerbal and the Articles the developers release to stay on top of things.

Daily Kerbal: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forums/70-The-Daily-Kerbal

Articles: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/content/

Glad to have you aboard Jack!

Feel free to swing over to the Suggestions & Development sub-forum if you want to discuss ideas for the game, see what other players are suggesting, or get a better idea of what's next (some ideas have been labeled as planned for the final game on the stickied threads there)

Regards,

Northstar

Hi

I believe there is a mod with an elevator launch tower the link is http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/71032-FASA-Launch-Towers

It should work with .90

Thats All

What? You want to some Kerbals in training?

Feel free to watch some other KSP vids while you're there

Welcome to the forums and this incredibly addictive game!

Edited January 21, 2015 by StrandedonEarth
